name: Highway Getway
description:
"Highway Getway" is a car parkour type game. The player controls a car to drive on the highway. There is a lot of game money on the road. The player can get the game money when he controls the car.
[Game operation]
Click the left mouse button to change the direction of the car
[Game features]
The car runs automatically. Players need to change the direction of the car according to the direction of the road to avoid the car hitting the edge of the road. If the car hit the edge of the road, the game will fail.
Try to get more money during the game, so control the time to change the direction of the car.
The speed of cars will get faster and faster over time. It is not easy to get more money for games. Those who like challenges can try.
